Name: Sixteen Centimillion Bits
Description: The hard-core gamer Songdis proposes a retro game music project and is looking for collaborators…
QuestDesc: The hard-core gamer Songdis proposes a retro game music project and is looking for collaborators…

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You made it without a hitch! That's a good sign. I'm sure our collaboration will be smooth sailing from here!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What do you think is indispensable to a Royan chiptune?

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's a great answer! Since we're at the Bjartr Woods and basking in the light of the Reactor Drive...

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...All we need now is a Soliskin.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I believe Soliskin are quite musically talented. They even have their own performance venues!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One is up high in the Solvein Canopy, but there are a few venues here, too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soliskin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chuchuluu...(*Dejected cheeps*)

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I get it... Your buddies didn't come today. It wants to play with us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I could have been a Shepherdess when I was living in the village.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But after I got into Startorch Academy, I fell behind in every class. It really is a place for the best of the best, and I wasn't one of them.

Options.PlotLineKey: So you played video games instead?

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course not! I studied hard!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But if I wasn't in my room studying, I was at the arcade.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From jungles that looked like the Bjartr Woods, to metropolises like I could never imagine, games have taken me to so many different places and left me with so many beautiful memories.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I want to write a song that will remind me of all that beauty.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soliskin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chu, Chuluuchu...(*Expectant cheeps*)

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry little fella, we can play right now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That was so much fun! Look, the Soliskin are happy too!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soliskin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chuluu, Chuchuluuluu (*Pleased cheeps*)

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's this? They're giving you the Soliseeds on their heads!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These are very important! Soliskin usually only give them to their herders. Take good care of them!

Options.PlotLineKey: Great! Now, about what we're here for...
Do you have enough inspiration now?

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't you worry! Our adventure with the Soliskin will be the foundation for my composition!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for coming along and helping me find inspiration! I think we've got all the ideas we need for now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll let you listen to the song as soon as it's written!

Options.PlotLineKey: Where will I find you when it's ready?

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me think...

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, I'm just about done with games for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The song I'm writing is, in fact, a farewell to them. Isn't it funny?

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I already have a favorite Department, and I'll need to work hard to get into the research group I want.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm grateful that games were a source of companionship... But I want to put them down for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These memories are precious to me, so I want to properly say goodbye to my games, the arcade, and the worlds they created.

Dialogues.Speaker: Soliskin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chu, Chuluu? (*Concerned cheeps*)

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I didn't mean to sound sad! Don't worry. Once I've reached my goals, I'll be back!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thank you for all the fun. I'm going to go write that song, and then it's time to hit the books!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Make sure you listen to the whole song when I send it to you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This looks like another Soliskin playground...

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I feel like I've just reached a new map in a game!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's play, buddy!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soliskin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chuu!

Dialogues.Speaker: Soliskin
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chuu Chuu, Chuluuluuluuluuluu! (*Overjoyed cheeps*)

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They want us to dance with them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on! Jump on the mushrooms in the same order as the Soliskin, and try to keep up!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's up? Did you miss me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My song is finished. I've sent it to your Terminal! In order to distinguish it from 8-bit chiptunes, I've decided to call it Sixteen Centimillion Bits!

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It took me forever to get right. I hope you like it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I hope that somewhere, somehow, this song will bring you strength—just like my games did for me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now I'm going to fight for the future I want.

Dialogues.Speaker: Songdis
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: See you in the future!
